ehi adahasa samanyaka piyawi manushyawa inri yan kri yathmakawimata nam +6 mattame ho eeta ihala wu mattamaka snayu sangnyawak me inriuru yanta labiya yuthu bawaki.+6ta wada adu mattamaka pawathina itha siyum shabda,gandha,rasa,shrawana, sparsha ha dhamma sanjanana kotharam me lokayathula pawathiyak eewa labaganimata ho eewata sanwediwimata piyawi manushya inrii yan asamath wana bawin samanyayen sithenne ebandu sanjanana nomathi bawaki.namudu wiwidha thathwa yatathe samanya piyawi manushya inrina yanta aramunu nowana me itha siyum shabda,gandha,rasa,shra wana, sparsha ha dhamma sanjanana pawa danena wiwidha awastha udawiya hakiya.me thathwaya athinriha ya sanjananaya namin handinwe.me athinri ya sanjananaya athiwiya haki wiwidha hethu thibe.molayathula kridayakarana tharangawala tharanga aayama prandamanaya aduwadi wima matha molayata inritha yangen sanwedanayawana sanweda wala siyumbawa thiranaya kere.samanyada thathwaya yatathe nolabena itha siyum inriiyana ya sanwedana pawa tharanga aayamayehi wenaswim matha molaya kara sampre shanaya wiyahakiya.ebandu awasthawaladi inriyama ya kriyakarithwaya abhibawa me lokaye athi wiwidha siyum sanweda sampreishanaya wiyahakiya.me tharanga aayamayehi wishala ho kudawima athara wiwidha parasayanwaladi siduwana sanweda samprewashanayata atham awasthawala inrii ya kriwayakarithwaya srujuwama sambandha wiya haki sema nowiyahaki awasthada athi bawa salakiya yuthuya.atham awasthawaladi molayata pradhamanawath tharam oksijan sapayima dubala wu awasthawaladida athinri ya sanjananata samana samanya awastha yatathe wisthara kala nohaki wiwidha asamanyaba thathwayanta muhunapamata siduwiya hakiya.esema biyawima,dadi antharayakara awasthawalata muhunapamata siduwima,maranabiya athiwima,dushkaratha yatathe diwigewimata siduwima aadi wiwidha hethu nisada athinrisa ya sanjananayata samanakam dakwana sanjanana awasthawalata muhunadimata siduwiya hakiya.biyak athiwima nisa sithathula athiwu biyata samana darshana,shrasawana,ganda suwanda danim,sparsha ha dhamma aramunu walata sabawinma muhunapamata siduwiya hakiya.holman awathara aadiya wishwasa karannekuta saba jiwithayedida ebandu de sanjananaya wiyahaki sambhawithawa samanyaa pudgalayekuta wada wadiya.meyata hethuwa itha thadinma sithata balapa manasika aakalpawalata anurupawa sanjananaya sakaswana bawini.

ese uthum budu sasuna rakshithawa gopithawa sirilak dharani thalayata shanthiya uda karamin pawathina kalhi paradesha aaka්ramanayangen saha misadutu balawegayangen athi wu shasana parihanikara arbudayan balawathwa pamini yugayaka “mage me wyayamaya raja sapa windima pinisa nowa gauthama budu sasune chirasthithiya pinisa ma wanne ya” kiya lakdiwa ekachatha්ra kota raja pamini dutugamunu maha narendrayan hata rajamaligayehi ran karanduwaka thanpath kota thibunu ran patheka liya atha ekthara anagatha wakyayak kiyawannata labune ya.
"ekak kiwwata dekak"
